SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectRoundList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수대기' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '마감' END AS ACCT_STATUS , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD , DATEDIFF(ACCS_END_DTM,NOW()) AS D_DAY ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
ORDER BY DATE_ORD, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 1 THEN ACCS_END_DTM END, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 2 THEN ACCS_STRT_DTM END, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 3 THEN CASE WHEN BSN_END_DTM IS NULL THEN ACCS_END_DTM ELSE BSN_END_DTM END END DESC
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.getRoundListTotCnt*/ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectRoundDtl*/ EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_IP ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_IP ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.getRoundDtl */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR , (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = BSN_CD) AS BSN_NM ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM ,EXPS_YN , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE BSN_CD = #{bsnCd} AND EXPS_YN = 'Y' ) A WHERE DATE_ORD = 1 ORDER BY ACCS_END_DTM, BSN_STRT_DTM ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectOPtnList */ * FROM ( SELECT OPTN_SEQ , A.STAGE_SEQ , OPTN_NM , OPTN_ORD , FILE_SEQ , (SELECT CONCAT(file_dsc,'.',file_extn) FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_SEQ = A.FILE_SEQ) AS FILE_NM , STAGE_ORD FROM CX_OPTN_DTL A JOIN CX_STAGE_DTL B ON A.STAGE_SEQ = B.STAGE_SEQ AND B.BSN_CD = #{bsnCd} AND B. FILE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY OPTN_ORD ASC ) TMP WHERE TMP.STAGE_ORD = #{stageOrd}

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.getApplyCount */ COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_MST A JOIN CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL B ON A.appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq AND B.rsume_ord = 1 WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{episdSeq} AND MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} AND APPCTN_STTS_CD != 'PRO_TYPE04_2_5'
SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.selectYearDtl */ MIN(YEAR) AS YEAR FROM CX_EPISD_MST
SELECT COUNT(*) /* WBBARoundMapper.getApplyUserCount*/ FROM (SELECT EPISD_SEQ FROM CX_EPISD_MST WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}) A INNER JOIN CX_APPCTN_MST B WHERE A.EPISD_SEQ = B.EPISD_SEQ
